channel.title: [ Website Radio ] Managers needed + DJ's [ ~ ]
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
We have come to the conclusion that we need a Manager for the Website Radio and some DJ's ofcourse :D If you would like to become a Manager, I would say 3 Managers is enough and you must be experienced in setting up the server etc... Please post in this thread.
---> I have no clue how many Managers we need or DJ's so you guys could help me out :D ---> PLEASE POST IF YOU WANT TO BECOME A MANAGER OR DJ! (You must have some experience) =)
Thanks, Surajd.

item.title: [ Website Radio ] Managers needed + DJ's [ ~ ]

Not enough people contributing to discussion, Website Radio will be posponed until more people agree.
